players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

You: "

"
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Bob: "Bob is innocent, Diana must be mistaken."
Diana: "I have reason to believe Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found evidence. If you don't believe me, please investigate Bob yourself."

You: "Bob, if you're the mafioso, then why are you trying to convince us that Diana is mistaken? If you were innocent, you would have said nothing and let the investigation speak for itself. I think Diana's evidence is credible."
Bob: "I'm innocent, I swear. Diana must have planted evidence to frame me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
